description:
Jared Padalecki tried to keep it a secret, but his wife just couldn't help herself! After teasing his fans for several weeks, the Supernatural actor finally confirmed that he and his wife, actress Genevieve Cortese, named their second baby boy Shepherd.Jared Padalecki 不想公开，不过他老婆可忍不住了！在几周前宣布孩子出生之后，《邪恶力量》男星Jared Padalecki终于公布了他们第二个孩子的名字——Shepherd。

"Ok. There it is, my wife @realGpad just revealed Tom's little brothers name.... Here goes," Padalecki, 32, tweeted on Tuesday, Jan. 21. Cortese added: "@jarpad and Shepherd watching some late night #supernatural."“好吧，我老婆@realGpad 刚刚公布了Tom 弟弟的名字...就是，”32岁的Padalecki1月21日在Twitter上说：“@jarpad和Shepherd在看《邪恶力量》。

The proud mom also revealed the cutiepie's first photo! Cortese shared an adorable snapshot of her hubby standing while his newborn slept on his arm wrapped in a blanket. 孩子妈妈还公布了首张照片！Cortese公布的照片上，Padalecki怀里抱着包着毯子的新生宝宝。

Padalecki and Cortese, 33, tied the knot in February 2010 and announced on Christmas Day about their new addition. Shepherd has now joined big brother Thomas, 21 months.Padalecki 和Cortese于2010年结婚，并且在当年的圣诞节上宣布妻子怀孕的喜讯。现在Shepherd还有个21月大的大儿子Thomas。
